column4: Hm, I've got a problem with Xgl/Compiz, on Gnome and nVidia. During usage, suddenly the window-decorations disappear, and I can't change focus on the windows.
I guess it could be gnome-window-decorations that's crashing, but where should I look to debug it?
Yeah, I know. But seeing there's good tutorials etc. on setting it up, I'd assume it was atleast slightly stable. ;P
